text: apa siri ana ath path wu wani danuma
~~ gilanpasa pujawa ~~
padika wedikawal nawikaranaya kara.
meya wiraha giyakda?
ethana issaraha gedara inna
penne nathi paththe ekayi...
eeth podi daruwa, wayasaka gahaniya dushanaya karanawa.
eheth rasayehi giju wu obata in walaki sitimata apahasuyi neda?

abhiyachanadhikarana sabhapathi winisuru prithi padman surasena saha abhiyachanadhikarana winisuru shiran gunarathna mahatha thaman hamuwehi idiripath kala mema karunu salaka balamin pethsam illa askaraganimata awasaradimata thiranaya keleya.
eeka magen niwadu paduwa sandaha nawa artha dakwimak.
niwasata yabada waththe wasikiliyak asala athgatagasa aya adawati siti bawa handunagena aththe in pasuwayi.
aayema pradarshanayak thiyenne labana awurudde.
munta spot ekata yana anith ewuntath lajja na.
namuth mama ee gana dukwanne na, mata oona wune hamadama minisun mawa dutuwa tayi kot andapu pradowalin yana, suwisal mandirawala jiwathwana charithayen midenna.
ke. ee. karunarathna marathan duwana wayasedi
komadilanthaye rata wasiya, aanduwa, wipakshaya athulu siyalu sama denama apa kapa wi sitinne me aashcharyaya rakaganimataya.
thopa pita pini wath, wasi wath nowate wa!

wasara 30k hamudawa wenuwen satan kara thama aarakshawa patha hamudawa saha rata harayamata siduwu awasthawe pawulaka wadagathkama thamanta watahunu bawa nawa yuda hamudapathi luthinan jenaral mahesh senanayaka mahatha pawasayi.
liyu wachanayaka athi namyashili nowana golu gathiya nisa sanwadaya parihaniyata pathwe yayi ohu kiya.
pransha janathawage samajawadi adahas athara mita ihatha kisima kalayakata pera thibunata wada me mayakari adahasata idak labi atha.
lihini kiyana charithaya anuhas ekka wagema samalka ekkath eka samanawa badila inna kenek.
mahamerak usathi susumak helimata wada deyak sidu kirimata ma hata nohakiya.

kaltan suwaudana wadasatahanata sahabhagi wu widesha rakiya prawardhana ha subasadhana amathya dilan perera mahatha pradeshaye aabadhitha pudgalayeku wenuwen roda putuwak bharakaruweku wetha parithyaga kala ayuru chayarupaye dakwe.
dina dahayakata wadiya wunath inna kiyala.
ethanin nonawathina ohu beragath sanka්ramanikayanta aahara, andum palandum ha nawathan sapaya dima palliye dayakakayange sahayada athiwa waha sidu karayi.
mula sita ma me mathawada deka ma pawathini.
raja unath dannawa ginithiyanna ida denna oona mokadda naththe mokadda kiyala
agamathi polonnaruwen : pohottuwa rath weyi !
eka sinhalayek me wyawastha wenas kirillata kamathi naha kiyana eka hungak wagakimen kiyanawa.
eheth diwya lokaya apata prathyaksha natha.

ee 'gaman margaya' wenaskaragannawa nam wenaskaraganna puluwan wenne, anithyaya wadima / anithyayama menehi kirima | mata diwiyaloke yanna / mata sugathiye yanna / mata sapa labanna, siyalu sathwayo niduk wethwa..
ee api hamotama dewiyan siyalu de nodena nisa.
dama thibu manchu pitinma polis athadanguwata path manthriwaraya polisiyen pahara gena yanu labina.
eki sandhisthanaya lesa ithihasaye sakshi satahan wanne jayawardhana palanaye dolos wasaraka nimawen pasu 1999 aarambha wu premadasa yugayath samagini.

me kathawe ena anek randawiya marana dandanayata yatath kota walikada bandhanagaraya thula randawa sitina randawiyek wana athara ohuta maraniya dandanaya uruma wanne mohomad siyam namathi muslim jathikayage ghathanaya sambandhawa saka pita athadanguwata ganimen anathuruwa pawathi nadu wibhagayen waradakaruwaku lesa adhikaranaya magin thiranaya kirimen anathuruwaya.

yana rallata thattu dana eka nathnam wala yana ath balala melo sihiyak nathiwa eekatama udaw karana eka godak ayage sirithane.ara hitlarge madhya amathi nathnam madhya upadeshaka wechcha aacharya gobels kiwwalu oonama boruwak siya dahas warayak kiyanna kiyanna eeka aththak wenawa kiyala.ehema nathnam harima deya minissu eeka aththak lesa piligannawa kiyana eka.kipa denek ekka katha karaddi ee wagema kipa denekge adahas walata sawan deddi aapu mathawada kipayak ekka thamayi me lipiya diga arenne.
deshapalana kathabaha kisiwak nowiya.
dan un ekathu karanne ple steshan gems.
hu hindiyenuyi sinhalenuyi ahuwa..
andan hayakata upakarana labadenna kiyala api saukhya amathyanshayen illa sitinawa"
ithin onna dan ara yatagiya wade mathukaraganna nawathath awasthawak uda wenawa.
pera sakasuma mangin spanynya sita, ingrisi pariwarthanaya, namuth obata ehi thani abhimathaya paridi wenath oonama thora gatha hakiya.
yamu kathawe ithuru tika kiyawa...
awidyawa nisa ya.
anka hathara sthanaye krida kale mahela.
me kisiwakin kiyawenne naha yaksha janathawa eka ma samajathiya pirisak kiya.
ranilwath rajapaksha kenek wath janadhipathiwaranen dinanne naha.
mema wendesiya tharagawaliye sabhapathi namal rajapaksha mahathage pa්radhanathwayen kolambaa lakshman kadiragamar jathyanthara sabadatha puhunu aayathanayedi eeye (22) pawathwini.
mama hithuwa eeta wada deyak peneyi kiyala...
eeth nathi unuth innawa kiyana karanawa thopi wunath pili gannawa aththa kiyala.
paratama welawa iwarayi...
ehema welawaka kohomada oba ee hama dema ahagena ganan ganne nathiwa inne" yanuwen ehidi prashna kara atha.

miliyana 406.8ka badu gewimen pasu shuddha labhayak wartha karamin thawath kapi penena mulya prathipalayak elidakwimata selan bankuwa samath wi sitiyi.2011 adala kala parichchedaya ha sasandimedi meya 59%ka wardhanayak wana athara 2011 palamu karthuwedi selan bankuwa ru.miliyana 256.3ka badu gewimen pasu shuddha labhayak wartha kara thibini.me athara 2012 palamu karthuwa wenuwen selan banku samuhaya ru.miliyana 412.5ka badu gewimen pasu shuddha labhayak wartha kara athi athara eya pera wasare palamu karthuwe wartha karana lada adala agaya ha sasandimedi 66%ka ihala yamaki..
mahacharya pathegama nyanissara himiapa athara ekata jiwath wu keneku miya giya pasu ema pudgalaya sihikara aagamanukulawa wathpiliweth kirima bauddha sampradaye pawatha ena prabala charithrayaki.
api yamu indiyawata.
athithaye idanma apita tiken tika theruna oliwarta minissu berana ekata wada minissu marana eka godak hodata karanna puluwan kiyala.
ee wagema kilinochchiya ape ranawiruwan allapu dinaye.
maheshita wechcha de -
eda premarathna thama sinamawe aarambhaka dukbara athdakim apata kiweya.
numbae senehasa tharam amila uththarithara senehasak
kalabaletayi tharahatayi mata ee kament eka mekata watuna . .

ratak yahapragamanika yathawe thawaduratath randawa ganimata ewan sad minisunge dayakathwaya agane ya.“sadharana samajayak sandaha wu jathika wyaparaya” yana namaya pawa yojana wi nothibunu wakawanuwe, siwil wyaparaya shakthimath kara ganima udesa wiwidha pudgalayinta aayachana kirimata da shiralta siduwa thibuni.
– ada puwath
mona kiyannada ithin ratama kunu godak wenakota..
natya nam balanna dennathi nisa wadiya dakinna.gedara innawa nam pus pataw dennek wage langama dawatenawa..
ee wana wita kakule thuwalawala panuwan hatagena darunu thaththwayaka pawatha atha.
ithin mata eeka amathaka wuna kiyanna kiwwama.
man banna ‘pare budiyan indala amma thaththata lajja karanna epa ‘ kiyala.
pada - channa jayanath
ehenam yaluwane kamathinam uthsaha karala balanna methanin yanna kamath....
hemin hemin watena wassa
mohu pasdenakugen yuth pawulaka siwiwana daruwaya.
mema yudangana chaithyaya wandana gathawa rachana kara aththe rajakiya panditha kakunawela shri piyarathana anu na himiyan wisini.

in ma adahas karanne wiplawadi deshapalanaya pilibada drudathara unanduwakin kapa kala deshapalana wijewira saha siya lamayinta saha birindata thadinma badi siti etharamma deshapalanika nowu manawawadi wijewiraya.
eya ganga pitara thaniwala idikara athi parani niwasawala padam pariksha kirimedi manawa pahadili we.
mema thaththwaya waha wataha gena eeta nisi pilithuru sapayimata shri lankiya daruwange anagathaya pilibandawa yam aadarayak athi widwathun ekwiya yuthuya.
ese pasal arambaena mul dinaye, pasale di wadi loku deyak sidu nowe.
tiran kumara bangagamaaarachchi podu rajya mandalayiya krida ulelakadi shri lankawa lada ihalama jayagrahanaya laba ganimata mewara hakiwiya.

eeta hethuwana karunu monawadayi salaka baluwahoth, dinapatha jiwithaye wehesakari bawath samanga athiwana manasika widawe sita, shariraya pura wihidunu darunu rogabadha dakwa wana, wishala parasayak thula wihidena bawa penenu atha.
weralu mal kiyanne ...
thawada eya mahawali wyapruthiya yatathe idi wunu ran tambae jalashayata jalaya sapayana pa්radhana pele jala poshakayak bawada amathaka nokala yuthu ya.
kisi ma uputa dakwimak nathi wa anek aya me me de kiya athayi prakasha kirima owun ge widhikramaye kotasak bawata path wi atha.
balapan umbaema koment eka.....
warsha thaththwaya samanga kalani , kalu , gin yana ganga wala jala mattam ihala gos athi bawa warmarga departhamenthuwa pawasayi.
mata nami mara badaginiyi.
api siyalu denama deshapalana sathwayo nisa....
ewita janadhipathi paththakan thiyala amathya mandala samajikayan ganan karanna baha
saduda madhya magin ek prawruththiyak prasiddhiyata path wiya.
ee nisa tikak pasuwi mage lipiya liyannam.
12 mage sathuro gon ralak men ma watakara sitithi.
obata sathipatha ho dinapatha itu kala yuthu karyayan siyalla yoda wada salasmak sakas karaganna.
meya lowa dirghathama upawasaya lesa handinweyi.
tikak weri pita liwuwa unath mita wada aththak thawath naha.

ithin ee lamayi kawadahari wishwa widyalayata thoraganna dawasata kolambaa lamayek widiyata thamayi salakenne.
digatama wade karagena yanna..
polawe rasnaya yawanna adumagane dawas deka thunak wath eka digata wahinna weyi.uusne?
apa samanga bhikshuwa akampitha sudu athdakim laba ganna!
mama ithin karanne kalawata bara rassawak..
wairasaya walandima saha pathira yama walaka ganima sandaha saniparakshaka kramaweda anugamanaya karana lesa ohu janathawagen illa siti.
idiri masa kihipaye di , thawaduratath awashya suwishesha angayan ha kriyakarakam me sadaha yoda ganimata niyamitha athara obe adahas ha yojana da ekkara ganimata balaporoththu we.
ee kalaya wana wita minissunta mage wyaparaya ho mama me karana de pilibanda nisi awabodhayak thibune naha.

henri pakar pawasana paridi ton dahasaka bara gal pawa parakramabahu rajuge atham warimarga idikirim walata bhawitha kara atha.
“dulaj ayiya ta aadareyi kiwwa..”
hossa langin massek giyoth iwaraya.
boho wita asuru kale mayi samiyayi.
rupawahiniya niwa damu asanka nagi sitiyi.

loka welendapole saba mila ganan pilibanda mana awabodhayakin thorawa kiripiti genwana samagam idiripath karana yojana sambandhayen thindu thirana ganimen rate janathawata siduwana asadharanaya pilibanda wagakiwayuththe kawurundayi janathawata prashnayaki.
moka unath nithi pothe...
labana sathiya wana wita kolambaa widiwalata janaya genwannata owuhu salasum karamin sitithi.
mata hithenne garu katayuthu thattaya mahatha ee pilibandawath liyayi ikmanatama.
apata inne rajek da bara karayek da yanna dana ganimata kamathi ayata oya nirnayaka bhawitha kala haki ya.

obage duwa putha nithi upadhiyata ho nithi widyalayata yomukara daksha nithignyayin bawata pathkaranna.

ee kiyanne minissunta puluwan "ookata hena gahapan" kiyala seyar karanna..ethakota eeka dakina seyar bhakthikayo "handi gawilama pala, thuh nodakin" wage dewal walin eekata sammadam wenawa.kodiwinayak karanna oonenam, karanna thiyenne ee hadayage foto kallak hoyan..."
hari api mehema deyak karamu.
nawa badda kilo gramayata 105yi.
ee anuwa aagamika uthsawa thrasthawadiyata labena kadima awasthawak wiya haki ya.
mema shaka lankawe pahatha rata wiyali kalapaye ha atharamadi kalapaye bahula washayen wyaptha wi atha.

ek yathurupadiyak udin wisiwi gos alata ihalin wu padika wedikawa matha ada watuni.
hata haththawaka withara pirisak gris yaka hewwath api dennata thama ahuwune.
nili upeksha swarnamalita me dinawala athi pradhana karya alutha […]

mokawath nathi unata..
ese arambai wedika natya ranga charikawe ohu rangapa athi natya ganana siyayakata adhikaya.

roseta wyapruthiya namathi wyapruthiya yanu kri.wa. 2000 sita 12,000 dakwa pawathwagena yamata apekshitha bhasha wisheshagnyayin saha swadeshika kathikayin dayaka karaganimin aasanna washayen paripurna, bhasha 1,500kin samanwitha lekhanagarayak godanagime wyapruthiyaki.

shri lanka inima aarambha karamin chamari athapaththu saha eshani lokusuriya pitiyata paminiyath aarambhaka sabandathawa lakunu 24kwa thibiya di palamu kadulla lesa lokusuriya lakunu 14kata dawi yanawath samangama eelaga panduwarayedi dewani kadulla lesa athapaththu lakunu 6k laba sitiyadi duwaddi dawi yamakata lakwiya.
mama ahuwe shrakayage diwya rathaya gana.
